short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the cursor when a shortcut key is pressed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome and Firefox extension that hides the cursor. Licensed under GPLv3.

Have feedback? Email hidecursor@gmail.com, or leave a github issue at https://github.com/alex391/hide-cursor
